item.title: By: Lily
item.dc:creator: Lily
item.description: I love looking at wind turbines, quite sculptural. Elegant.<br/><br/>Thank you for the photography and commentary. I'm not sure about "god's judgement' but certainly the patches of claimed land people seize for their suburbias in half acre minicosms are telling about society.
item.content:encoded:
I love looking at wind turbines, quite sculptural. Elegant.

Thank you for the photography and commentary. I’m not sure about “god’s judgement’ but certainly the patches of claimed land people seize for their suburbias in half acre minicosms are telling about society.
